feedbackItems.utterance: The more the farmers contribute to the collective, the lesser the probability of the pest spreading
When the pest arrives to a farm, it destroys it and the player looses the game
As farmers lose their crops there are less farmers to contribute to the collective. This increases the probability of pest spreading.
The pest can spread each year if no pest control is done.
If each farmer contributes 1GP per year, the risk of pest spreading will reduce.
